item.title: What is video game streaming?
item.author: Author
item.description: Nowadays, one can stream a whole lot of different, more especially music and video. Although it is “pretty” new, video game streaming is becoming more and more present. A short technical presentation of video game streaming Let’s start by defining what a video game is. I can see two big categories of game : small games: the ones you play inside your browser, on Facebook, etc.
